attributes.review:
Once I download this app, I got a virus. I am not aware of how, but once I immediately opened the app, I obtained a virus on my phone. I really don’t want to waste any more money on buying another phone, but I will have to. I can’t go to repair my phone due to COVID-19, and will have to pay a lot of money for a new phone plus taxes and shipping. It is absurd that this app gave me a virus when it is for our president; I don’t comprehend how this app has given me a virus. It is unacceptable and I will not stand for it. I don’t mean to sound rude or petty—which I probably am sounding—but it is a very unreliable app. 

The only reason why I did download this app is because I was going to try and convince myself who I should vote for as president; I did so, with no chance of actually considering voting for President Trump. 

Now that I have seen this app and what it is about, I have a reason not to vote for President Trump. 

It is highly unacceptable and I will not stand for it.
attributes.title: So Terrible

attributes.review: Okay so first of this is a really bad app.  Second of all my fridge started to grow a pair of arms and legs and then started beating me up because I slammed the door too many times.  Oh but do you want to know why I slammed the door so many times.  It’s because I was waiting for this awful app to download so I could look at Cheeto make those faces he makes.  Oh the faces.  They make me want to puke then eat the puke then add some salt and rotten eggs and then puke that all up and then eat a trash bag filled with that puke and puke it all on Mr. racist Trump.  Wow I’m really glad I got to vent right now.  Thanks.  Well dinosaur for 2015 place your votes now😚
attributes.title: Oh boy

attributes.review: Like all my fellow citizens, I was trying to learn more about your president (Obama is still my president😌) to see how amazing he is. But when I entered the app there was this spinning thing that started HYPNOTIZING ME. It kept saying, “VOTE TRUMP 2020” “VOTE TRUMP 2020” “WHITE SUPREMACY” “BUILD A WALL” I had to quickly delete the app as fast as I could! I felt betrayed and USED. How DARE this cheeto try to hypnotize me. DO NOT BUY THIS APP. I’m just lucky I deleted is soon enough, not everyone is as lucky😣 The old neighbor boy didn’t make it out soon enough, and now he goes around calling women dishwashers, I guess that was round two of the hypnosis😖😭WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.title: cheeto disappoints once again😭✨💖

attributes.review: I was using the app as a normal person wouldn’t because it’s a trump app and why the hell would you have an app for a racist president? anyway, when i downloaded the app in order to see what it was i got a notification that said that I should cut of my cat’s tail and chop it up for food for my cat, and if that wasn’t enough that I should cut off his toes too! how the heck did he even know that I have a cat? this app spies on you once you download it! whatever you do, don’t download it!!! I can’t believe it would send such vulgar messages to me!! It’s completely insane!! anyway... 🧚🏻‍♀️✨ TRUMP 2020 ON A GRAVESTONE 💛🌸🌈
attributes.title: It suggested I murder my cat!

attributes.review: this app hacked my bank account which i was saving for my pet pig who has recently passed. after hacking my account a wizard was sent to my address and turned me into a cheto. i then fell to the floor and was later carried away by ants to their hideaway. i was at their hideaway, a sad little cheto i was pleading for mercy. as i screamed i saw a very tall man with another man who was very short. the tall man then looked at me. i realized it was no other that harry tomlinson and louis styles. harry picked me up and said that he would help me. on the walk home harry was paying more attention to me than louis. louis then got jealous grabbed me from harry’s hands and yelled i’m your husband pay attention to me. he then proceeded to throw me on the ground and stomp on me. there i was a crushed cheto both my soul and body smashed to pieces. a chocked sob escaped my mouth as all the dust from my body floated away in the wind. all of me gone in the wind. free at last i was. - yours truly the cheto gone to soon
attributes.title: made me die✨💎

attributes.review: so ever since i got this app i wanted to get news about my “president” but every time i go on it it seem to give fake news and it glitches 😔 so i deleted it and it started glitching my phone! DO NOT download this app it will glitch your phone and make it lag! I tried to download it again to see if it would stop glitching my phone but it wouldn’t stop i had to take it to the app store to get it fixed please DO NOT get this app if you don’t want your phone to glitch and lag thanksss😘😘 never downloading this again
attributes.title: app seems to be giving fake news and glitches your phone DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: Overall I am unsatisfied🥱. This app is absolutely ludicrous👺. I am revolted😾, for I was required to put in my personal information in😦😦😦.  I don’t feel safe knowing the 🍊 has ALL of my hidden details🙈. Anyways, 1 out of 10❤️. The one only being in support of our dearest Barron and Melania😝. Off topic but, free Barron and Melania, those poor people look ✨𝓶𝓸𝓻𝓽𝓲𝓯𝓲𝓮𝓭✨ to be upon the Trump household. Anyways, I highly📈 do not recommend this app and overall, supporting the r_c!st 🐖 is a crime ! You should all be ashamed of yourselves ! Go back to your corner🧎🏼📐, and think🧠 about your choices before you vote the wrong man silly😝
attributes.title: Horrendous App Choice

attributes.review: Oh my where do I even start well here we go I gave this app one star because you can’t rate it lower than that which is sad because I was really Hopeful that I would be able to but I guess not well it is also because of the presidents disgusting and repulsive actions he’s taken and is continuing to make, it still confuses me how people still support him because if you are a trump supporter than your also a just as bad of a person as trump himself because you are supporting the horrible things he is doing I hope this app will be deleted well that is it this but could say so much more
attributes.title: Trump🤡

attributes.review: At first I thought everything was fine. Then after a few days I noticed the app was physically stealing my information 😤 At night while I slept, the app would rummage through my file cabinets, taking my private documents and Shipping them to CHINA 😱 The Trump 2020 app even managed to get ahold of my tax returns 😶 At first, I thought I was going crazy, but then I notice the app was unhinged... it got high off of bleeding me dry and started selling my belongings on Facebook market place. My toaster, my dog, life sized bust of Ab Lincoln , SOLD 🤢 The trump 2020 app ruined my life and now China knows everything about me 😭😭 Don’t download this app!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I got this app to support the ✨😘president🧚🏽✨, but I had to wait A WEEK!!!! When I first opened it I saw an orange man on my screen and threw my phone out my car window and got into A CAR CRASH!!!! When I got this app I was told that BTS would come and meet me, and that I would be able to go to an anime world... but I’m still here😭😭and then after all of that I had to PAY for this god awful app!! I’m a poor child! After I made my first and only payment I kept on getting emails with pictures of a crusty old orange man that CLAIMED to be the president!!!! If you read my review you now why I’m in the hospital😭 PLEASE. DONT. GET. THIS. APP.
attributes.title: ❌WARNING❌
